subject: Sports Injuries
Football
lead_paragraph: A season-ending injury to Domenik Hixon further depleted the team’s receiving corps. And did a couple of Giants fake being hurt to slow the Rams’ no-huddle offense?
snippet: A season-ending injury to Domenik Hixon further depleted the team’s receiving corps. And did a couple of Giants fake being hurt to slow the Rams’ no-huddle offense?
